name: Phở Special Recipe Pack
description:
The Sunday roast of Vietnam is Phở Bo, the classic beef noodle soup. 

Learn how to make this Vietnamese national dish with our authentic recipe starter kit, which includes:

- 1 bag of rice noodle sticks (454g) 
- A spices bundle 
- Giadinhfood.com's Phở recipe   
- A canvas cotton tote bag with a bowl of Phở photo print. 

Size of tote bag: 32cm (w) x 36cm (h) with 10cm gusset

name: Goop's Vietnamese Salad Tote Bag
description:
Make sure you never forget an ingredient for GOOP's Vietnamese salad with this specially designed canvas cotton bag. 

It features a photo print of Gia dinh food's visual interpretation of the recipe... so it's helpful for tracking down and carrying all those ingredients. 

This is a shoulder bag with long handles, a perfect accessory for grocery shopping.

Size: 32cm (w) x 36cm (h) with 10cm gusset

name: Noodle Bowl Tote Bag
description:
Noddle dishes are a staple of Vietnamese cuisine. If you can't pick a favourite, this 12oz canvas cotton bag features a photo print of the 'top 4' noddle dishes: Bún bò Huế, Bún Thịt Nướng, Bún riêu and Phở. 

This is a shoulder bag with long handles and is a perfect accessory for grocery shopping. 

Size: 32cm (w) x 36cm (h) with 10cm gusset

name: Bánh Xèo Tote Bag
description:
Show off your green credentials with this strong woven cotton bag,   ideal for carrying all your shopping and other bits and bobs. 

The main design is a photo print of bánh xèo, capturing the preparation of these sizzling savoury pancakes. 

Size: 32cm (w) x 36cm (h) with 10cm gusset.

name: Bánh mì Lunch Bag
description:
Save money and be eco friendly by investing in a handmade lunch bag by Giadinhfood.com. It's a stylish way to carry your home made lunches to work or school. 

This lunch bag is made from strong woven organic cotton, with a bold photo print of a Vietnamese style baguette sandwich.

Features: Velcro closing and cord handle
Size: 12" x 13"
